title: Manage Edge Network Firewall rules
description: Configure edge protection for your IP. Your firewall rules will be applied at the edge of the OVHcloud network, which  filters inbound traffic to prevent links to your service from getting saturated.
subDescription: It is recommended, for added security, to pair this feature with your server’s network firewall. Only 20 rules can be defined per IP.
tcpNoteDescription: Please note that “TCP session status” (TCP established) refers to specific TCP protocol flags, as the Edge Network Firewall does not track TCP sessions.
max_rules_reached_tooltip: You have reached the maximum number of rules
disabled_firewall_modal_description: Are you sure you want to disable the Edge Network Firewall on the {{ip}} IP?
enable_firewall_modal_description: This will enable the Edge Network Firewall along with defined rules.
enable_firewall_tooltip: Enable firewall rules for this IP (disabling will result in the rules being kept only when the Scrubbing Centre is active)
fragments_tooltip: You cannot select the fragment option if you have defined a source port and/or destination port.
add_rule_success_message: The firewall rule will be added
delete_rule_success_message: The firewall rule will be deleted
confirmDeleteRuleDescription: Are you sure you want to remove the firewall for this IP address?
portRangeError: Please enter a value between 0 and 65535
invalidSourceError: Please enter a valid source IPv4 address
conflictingRuleError: The port (or port range) conflicts with another rule
only_permit_rules_warning: We have detected only “Accept” rules and no “Deny” rules, so no traffic will be blocked by this configuration. We recommend the last rule for effective configuration. Click here  <Link>create Deny rule</Link> to add this rule.
mitigation_mode_active_warning_toltip: Mitigation is currently enabled. The firewall cannot be disabled.
firewall_not_created_tooltip: The firewall cannot be enabled until a first rule has been created.
destinationPortLowerThanSourcePortError: The destination port must be greater than or equal to the source port
createRuleErrorMessage: There are errors in the data entered, please check the fields in red.
